| Stack                                           | Heap                                            |
+=================================================+=================================================+
| -   used to store smaller data like references  | -   used for storing larger objects             |
|                                                 |                                                 |
| -   relatively smaller in size                  | -   size grows as the need of the program       |

|                                                 |     space automatically                         |
